name: Birds'n'Blocks
description:
In Birds'n'Blocks you have to help the birds! They can´t fly because of their tiny and small wings.
You have to remove the blocks without the birds touching the ground (because they don´t like the ground or there might be cats around). If they are falling on the ground they get angry and you lose!
It features 80 levels (more coming soon) and an addictive gameplay.
There are different kinds of blocks with different properties ("normal", "bouncy", "sliding" and "safe for birds").
You can remove blocks by touching them with your finger!
Don´t get angry if you are not able to solve a level. They are all solvable. If you need help on any level just tell us on the "Birds'n'Blocks"-Facebookpage! We will help you!

IMPORTANT: If you have problems starting the game or if it crashes please tell us via support@sprakelsoft.com
Thank you!
